Headline: Brown Line Trains Resume Stopping at Sedgwick Station
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains have resumed making stops at Sedgwick Station.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: Brown Line trains have resumed making stops at Sedgwick Station.

Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with significant delays in both directions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with significant delays in both directions.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
